title: Camera problems
body: While I play i play with camera unlocked and hold spacebar to focus me and just release to look around and stuff. Now whenever I press spacebar it holds onto me for a fraction of a second and then goes back to being unlocked. Is there anyway to fix this or am I just boned?

replies.body: The camera should focus on you as long as you hold your spacebar down.  There might be an issue with the keyboard that's releasing the key.  Would you be able to swap to another keyboard as a way to rule out this possibility?
Let me try that real quick
It seems to be working now. Thank you
Glad to hear everything is okay now!  A moment of silence to your keyboard for spacing out.
